product_name: The North Face Powdercloud Gloves - Men's
long_description: Designed for the coldest days on the slopes, the Powdercloud gloves from The North Face have Gore-Tex(R) inserts, warm insulation and an articulated fit to keep your hands warm. Heatseeker(TM) insulation on the palms and backs of hands has a great warmth-to-weight ratio, and is compressible and extremely durable, making them ideal for cold weather. Waterproof, highly breathable Gore-Tex inserts keep your hands dependably dry and comfortable. FlashDry(TM) fabric additive in the polyester lining dramatically improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out. Removable wrist wraps inside the gloves are designed to hold hand warmer packets (sold separately) to warm blood as it flows to your hands. 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct gloves with an accurate and consistent fit. Radiametric Articulation(TM) improves warmth and blood flow to your fingers by mirroring the natural relaxed curve of the hand. The North Face Powdercloud gloves have long gauntlet cuffs that cinch closed to keep snow out; use the ladderlock wrist cinches to keep heat in and adjust the fit.
